attributes.action: resist the EU's suggestion of removing the crown from a pint glass.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU are talking about changing the pint glass. They feel that the crown on our pint glasses should be changed to a French CE symbol. The crown on our pint glass has been a system in use since the 17th century, so it's fair to say it's part of our culture, and I can't see why we can't keep our symbol?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
